name: DIG IT! (itch)
description:
5th place finisher in the 22nd GM48!

Collect as much treasure as you can while descending further into the earth! Use your spoils to upgrade your gear and become the richest miner of all time! You might even find the mysterious golden room...

15 unique levels each with their own puzzles!

Controls:

Left and Right = Move

Up = Jump

Down = Buy Item (in shop)

X or C = Attack

X+Down = Downward Attack

Z = Ranged Attack (if available)

R = Reset Current Level (also available on pause screen)

Enter = Pause

Tips:

The shop closes as soon as you start digging!

Remember you can restart if you miss a treasure or get stuck!

More treasure means a better rating at the end! Minimum rating is 1, Max is 113!

You can't dig upwards... but there's a way to make yourself some stairs!

First gm(48)! Ended up pulling an all nighter to meet my standards but I'm okay with how it turned out!

Art, Music, Code, etc. all created by myself!
